Camp.synopsis: Nested dialogue in which player can select which companion to dismiss in favour of recruiting another. In this dialogue, the player is speaking ONLY to the recruitee - the companion being dismissed does not speak at all.

Hirelings_48.speaker: Withers
Hirelings_48.text: Naught is forgotten. It is recorded.

Hirelings_63.speaker: Player
Hirelings_63.text: I'll leave Alfira here in camp.

Hirelings_38.speaker: Withers
Hirelings_38.text: Impossible. Thou art bound together, for the moment.

Hirelings_4.speaker: Player
Hirelings_4.text: Let Jaheira stay behind for now.

Hirelings_33.speaker: Player
Hirelings_33.text: You can swap out with Minsc.

Camp_32.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll

Camp_92.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
Camp_92.text: Miniature as Boo is, he is also giant. You will need to make room for us, my friend.

Camp_83.speaker: Player
Camp_83.text: All right. Meet me at camp.

Camp_33.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
Camp_33.text: Boo knows when Minsc is not wanted.

Camp_66.speaker: Player
Camp_66.text: You can take Astarion's place - he'll stay here at camp.

Camp_52.speaker: Narrator
Camp_52.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

Camp_15.speaker: Player
Camp_15.text: Gale could do with a rest.

Camp_3.speaker: Player
Camp_3.text: You can trade places with Wyll.

Camp_48.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll

Camp_13.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
Camp_13.text: Take your time, my friend! Boo shall snooze a while longer.

Camp_61.speaker: Narrator
Camp_61.text: *But the vessel only stares blankly. You'll need to make room in your party, first.*

Recruitment_104.speaker: Halsin, Jaheira, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, Wyll
Recruitment_104.text: There is no room for me, I am afraid. Perhaps dismiss another, then I can join you.

Recruitment_97.speaker: Player
Recruitment_97.text: All right. Meet me at camp.

Recruitment_76.speaker: Player
Recruitment_76.text: Take Astarion's place - he can head back to camp.

Recruitment_61.speaker: Narrator
Recruitment_61.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

Recruitment_31.speaker: Astarion
Recruitment_31.text: I would object, but sitting by the fire while you do all the hard work sounds marvellous, actually.
Recruitment_31.context: NodeContext: Astarion speaking to the companion origin character that's replacing him in the party. "Them" refers to the player's avatar characer.

Recruitment_16.speaker: Player
Recruitment_16.text: Gale could do with a rest.

Recruitment_41.speaker: Gale
Recruitment_41.text: Keeping your greatest weapon in reserve, eh? An excellent strategy.

Recruitment_89.speaker: Jaheira
Recruitment_89.text: Well. I know when I'm not wanted.
Recruitment_89.context: NodeContext: Well. I know when I'm not wanted. - not shitty, just gentle faux haughtiness

Recruitment_99.speaker: Karlach
Recruitment_99.context: NodeContext: A bit immature bad attitude. Player has told her to swap with someone else who wants to join the party.

Recruitment_73.speaker: Minsc
Recruitment_73.text: Let us lay down a while, Boo. Do not think I have missed your cantenkery today.

Recruitment_92.speaker: Shadowheart
Recruitment_92.text: If you insist. Don't have all the fun without me.

Recruitment_3.speaker: Player
Recruitment_3.text: You can trade places with Wyll.

Recruitment_94.speaker: Wyll
Recruitment_94.text: All right. I know a shortcut.

Recruitment_84.speaker: Halsin
Recruitment_84.text: I shall be waiting. Come find me when you need me.

Recruitment_101.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
Recruitment_101.text: I will wait in camp. Patiently, even.

Recruitment_14.speaker: Halsin, Jaheira, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, Wyll
Recruitment_14.text: Take your time, my friend! Boo shall snooze a while longer.
